oyunu bitirince bi 10 saatte topluluk haritalarına gömdüm, story mod kadar güzel olmasada arada girip eğlenip çıkılır mesela böyle arkadan dinlenilebilecek sözel dersler olunca açıp oynarsın hem hocayı da dinlersin sarar

coop modu da çok güzel tek sıkıntı baya kanser olunabiliyor arkadaşla girince mesela Ardak. var arkadaşım onla oynarken birbirimizi baya trolledik valla full walkthrough ta damların 5 dk de yaptığı şeyi 30 40 dk de yapamadık siz siz olun arkadaşınızla girersiniz birbirinizi trollemeyin

neyse indirimde 7 tl ye hem 1 hem 2. oyun alınabiliyor indirimsiz 28 tl ye bile hakkeder çok güzel ayırca 1. oyunun Türkçe seslendirmesi var https://www.youtube.com/c/SoftG_Works/videos destek olursanız sevinirim kanalın sahibini tanımıyorum ama böyle insanlar sayesinde Türkçe dublaj elde etmemiz çok hoş

This game has to be a solid 10/10. Great level design and story. Not many games get me attached to the story and situation like Portal 2 did. I would recommend anyone to pick this game up and give it a go. Finished it in around 6 hours.

Portal is one of the best games ever made, Portal 2 IS one of the BEST games of the 2010's. Some people may be like "this game is too short" and "this game is overrated" which I can understand, but the thing is Portal 2 was released in 2011 and it still is more original compare to current super popular games like "Fortnite". And because Portal 2 is fantastic I highly recommend it. 10/10

I love Portal so much. Everything about it is amazing, the humor, the puzzles, the plot. It is the perfect game for me, both of them. I just beat Portal 2 for the second time, and honestly, i'm over here bawling again because it's over. I wish there was more, it means so much to me.

I hope other people get as much out of it as i have.

Наверняка вы знаете, что portal 2 является игрой с самыми лучшими отзывами. И не напрасно! Игра интересная. С отличным и загадочным сюжетом. Молчаливая главная героиня, харизматичная ГЛаДОС, болтливый Атлас. Графика приятная, совершенно не старая. Мультиплеер реализован отлично. Возможность игры с друзьями  - большой плюс проекта. Системные требования настолько низкие, что игра тянет даже на самых слабых ноутбуках. Оптимизация превосходная. Цена приемлемая, а по скидке за 25 рублей - просто находка. Минусов у игры попросту нет. Рекомендую эту игру абсолютно всем любителям классики.

If you want more Portal puzzles, get the game. It has those in spades. If you want the innovative quirky charm that took risks instead of handing you something Valve already knows you like in the form of a watered down story, you may feel cheated. It is what we have come to expect from sequels.
